name: congressionalappchallenge
description: LA County shelter and resource finder - helping people find essential services (Congressional App Challenge)

scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/api && poetry run alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:seed: cd apps/api && poetry run python scripts/seed_data.py
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm db:up && pnpm db:migrate && pnpm db:seed
